title: Dan Crenshaw
added: Crenshaw spoke at the [[2020 Republican National Convention]], calling the United States "a country of heroes."<ref>[https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/elections/2020/08/26/rnc-rep-dan-crenshaw-considered-rising-star-republican-party/5637653002/ USA Today on MSN - "Who is Dan Crenshaw? Freshman Congressman who spoke at RNC is considered a rising star"]</ref><ref>[https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/2020-election/blog/2020-08-26-rnc-updates-n1238051/ncrd1238319 NBC News - "Rep. Dan Crenshaw honors front-line workers in RNC speech"]</ref> Crenshaw was notably one of the only convention speakers who did not mention Trump by name, and who has not endorsed Trump's [[Donald Trump 2020 presidential campaign|re-election]].<ref>[https://www.houstonchronicle.com/politics/texas/article/Houston-Rep-Dan-Crenshaw-was-one-of-the-few-RNC-15517962.php Houston Chronicle - "Houston Rep. Dan Crenshaw was one of the few RNC speakers who didn't mention Trump"]</ref><ref>[https://www.axios.com/rep-dan-crenshaw-at-rnc-we-are-a-country-of-heroes-df34741a-82a5-4740-aff9-243cd2a2699b.html Axios - "Rep. Dan Crenshaw does not address Trump by name during RNC speech"]</ref>

title: Dan Crenshaw
added: In 2020, [[Fortune (magazine)|''Fortune'' magazine]] included Crenshaw in their '[[40 Under 40]]' listing under the "Government and Politics" category, stating that he "wears his service to his country on his face."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Dan Crenshaw {{!}} 2020 40 under 40 in Government and Politics|url=https://fortune.com/40-under-40/2020/dan-crenshaw/|access-date=2020-09-13|website=Fortune|language=en}}</ref>
